Description: Lonza Group supplies products and services to pharmaceutical and agrochemical industries.
Full Description: Lonza Group AG, a Life Sciences driven chemical company, supplies active ingredients, chemical intermediates and biotechnology solutions to the pharmaceutical and agrochemical industries. The company also offers a catalogue of organic intermediates for a range of applications, such as pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, vitamins, food and feedstuff, dyes and pigments, adhesives and fragrances. It also manufactures specialty biocides and oleochemicals; and develops and produces specific polymer intermediates, unsaturated polyester-resins, compounds and composites. The company operates in three divisions that include Exclusive Synthesis & Biopharmaceuticals; Organic Fine & Performance Chemicals; and Polymer Intermediates. Exclusive Synthesis & Biopharmaceuticals In the area of Exclusive Synthesis and Biopharmaceuticals, Lonza is the custom manufacturing for the global life sciences companies. In addition to Lonza's traditional chemical custom manufacturing, Lonza offers microbial custom fermentation and biotransformation services. Lonza Biologics is focused on the production of therapeutic monoclonal antibodies and recombinant proteins produced by mammalian cell cultures. Exclusive chemical synthesis: Exclusive chemical synthesis engages in the process development and manufacture of intermediates and active ingredients. It is used in Life sciences industry, pharmaceuticals and animal health products. Exclusive microbial fermentation and biotransformation: Exclusive microbial fermentation and biotransformation processes development and manufactures intermediates, active ingredients and biopharmaceuticals. Its products are used Life sciences industry, pharmaceuticals and cosmetics. The company also offers L-Carnitine (L-Carnipure), which is applicable in sports nutrition, food, pharmaceuticals and feedstuffs. Exclusive microbial biopharma fermentation: Exclusive microbial biopharma fermentation engages in the process development and manufacture of therapeutic recombinant proteins and antibody fragments. It is used in pharmaceutical and biotechnology industry. Exclusive mammalian cell fermentation: Exclusive mammalian cell fermentation engages in the process development and manufacture of therapeutic monoclonal antibodies and recombinant proteins, proprietary GS-expression system, which are used in the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industry. Organic Fine & Performance Chemicals In the area of organic fine and performance chemicals, the company develops, manufactures, and sells various organic chemical intermediates applied in pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, vitamins, food and feed, dyes, pigments, adhesives, and fragrances, as well as polymers. The sector performance chemical is mainly engaged in the development and production of biocides and oleochemicals. These core activities are supplemented by the polymer intermediates business, including additives, unsaturated polyester resins, compounds, and composites. Organic Fine Chemicals: The company offers Niacin, niacinamide, Diketene derivatives, Hydrocyanic acid derivatives, Engineering polymer additives and Meta â€“ Metaldehyde. Its products are used in food and feedstuffs, pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, colorants Vitamins, optical brighteners, agrochemicals, electronics, aerospace industry, and coating Snail. Performance Chemicals: The company offers microbiologically active substances, such as Quaternary ammonium, compounds, Halogenated hydantoins; and Hydantoin derivatives. It also offers Oleochemical derivatives. The company's products are used by the disinfectants for household, industrial and institutional applications, including water treatment and wood preservation; biocides for water treatment, pools and spas, and household disinfection; preservatives for personal care and household products; and food ingredients, humectants and emollients for personal care, processing aids and lubricants for polymer and textile industry, and industrial defoamers.

Description: Logline is an innovative platform tailored for the video industry to help boost productivity, find clients and connect with professionals
Full Description: Logline is a new video marketplace and production platform that connects clients with production houses giving them space to collaborate and work on projects.  Logline was created give new ways for clients to shortlist production companies and get the best videos at the lowest prices. Logline also aims to reduce the hassle of finding the right people for any given project. Logline acts as a database of actors and production professionals who can then be matched with potential clients that post job offers using the app. Logline’s ability to matchmake clients and industry professionals creates synergies that will help reduce the time needed to put together a video, as well as grow the industry as a whole. Logline Tools Logline consist of clearly described tools which are accessed via a clean and simple user interface. They are listed below: People – An easily searchable database of video professionals available for hire. Users can refine their search using many different criteria such as Area or Role. Connections – A list of all the people a user has connected with. This is also where users can exchange messages, see all system notifications and invite people to join Logline. Castings – A list of all open casting calls. It is free for users to both post and respond to casting calls. Jobs – A list of all active job offers which makes it easy to find that perfect position.  Studio – A space to work on video projects. Studio tools include: Concept – A tool for brainstorming and noting down the best ideas, with easy ways to transform these ideas into script scenes. Script – This script writing tool helps people create scripts that conform to industry standards. Functions such as converting your script to different script formats are coming soon. There are also templates which allow seamless import and export of scripts between Logline and other applications. Storyboard – An easy-to-use tool that helps organize the drawings and set descriptions for a video project, making it easy to adjust camera angles before shooting. Guest list – A useful tool that helps the production teams of entertainment and current affairs shows keep track of who is coming to town so they will never miss an interesting guest Cast – A tool which helps the production team organize cast lists, and store all artiste contacts along with their biometric data. Casting – Create casting calls with this tool. Specify the requirements of your projects and Logline will automatically match you with the right people. Tasks – A tool to organize and schedule tasks for team members, to set deadlines and keep track of progress. Upcoming improvements A host of new functions will be added in the near future to broaden the platform’s capabilities. Here are just a few of them: Budget – This Logline tool can give you an estimate of how much your project will cost during the planning phase, as well as track the cost of your project when it is underway.  Look Book – Sharing visual concepts for projects among stakeholders via images, videos and artworks will be made easy with Logline’s Look Book function,  Pitching – Showcase your ideas and early drafts for a project or send them directly to clients with this tool.  Meet the Logline Team Logline is the brainchild of two entrepreneurs from Europe. Development began in July 2015 and was supported by Spaze Ventures with the goal of changing the way people work in the video industry. In December 2016 Logline has joined the Mediapreneur incubation program run by Singapore's biggest media company Mediacorp.  Borys Specjalski –Co-Founder of the company is an experienced project manager who previously worked in Afghanistan with the 1TV television station.   Danijela Habek – Danijela is a live TV show producer that has successfully produced three seasons of Got Talent, X Factor and many other internationally-recognized formats. As Logline’s workﬂow specialist, she has invaluable knowledge of the needs of the industry and makes sure Logline’s tools can meet them.

Description: LocName is a new global addressing system that allows residents/businesses to choose their own address, giving the world freedom of address.
Full Description: LocName, short for “Location Name”, is a new global addressing system (GAS) that allows residents/businesses to pick their own address. As it stands today, every country has their own specific addressing system; USA has zip codes, Canada has postal codes, some countries don't even have names for all their streets! The only unified system which is accepted globally is the GPS coordinates system, which is a long stream of numbers that is too hard to memorize, share, and reach. What LocName does is combines these two pieces of information (address details, and GPS coordinates) under one unique, personalized name picked by the users themselves. Our first products are the LocName web and mobile applications that are targeted towards everyday residents and business locations. How the App Works: Users of one of our apps (iOs, Android, or Web) will allow the app to find their current location using GPS. They will then give that location a name, or what we like to call a LocName (users can also edit additional details and privacy settings for their place). Thats all it takes! That place now has a new, memorable address that can be shared with friends and clients looking to reach that location. Users can use GPS navigation to reach any LocName location. By saving a list of favorite friends' places and business locations, users will have an address book of GPS locations accessible to them straight from their pocket. The LocName API Our second product is one targeted towards e-commerce websites that will help capture accurate customer location details to help curb the loss in revenue due to human error in inputting faulty address details. Today e-commerce websites experience about 8% of revenue lost from customers entering faulty address information into their systems. Being a multi-billion dollar industry, the loss of total revenue is immense. LocName is currently working on the LocName API which will capture customers' address details as well as their GPS coordinates, doubly confirming each customers location details. Users can choose the enter either piece of information (address details or physical map location) while the other will be automatically filled in based on information from the first field. All information will go through a verification process based on previous successful deliveries to addresses with the same details. Delivery Optimizer In the future, LocName will work on a counterpart to the LocName API targeted towards delivery service providers and couriers. By fully integrating LocName's technology into their system, we will be able to cut down delivery times and errors by providing accurate customer locations and information relevant to the delivery process. Features: -Simplify your address by giving it a unique LocName.  -Any combination of GPS coordinates can be saved as a LocName. Save any location in the world!  -Share your unique LocName with your friends and clients by email, text or putting it on your business cards and flyers.  -Use GPS Navigation to reach yours and others' locations by simply searching the LocName on one of our apps.  -Create an address book of favourite locations where you can save and access your most used LocNames.  -Adjust the privacy settings of each one of your LocNames to whether you want it to viewed privately or publicly.  -Sign in with Facebook to see who of your friends are using LocName and invite those who are not!

Categories: Agriculture, CleanTech, Energy, Renewable Energy, Solar
Description: With the national percentage of renewable energy mandates being imposed across the country, Louisiana falls well short of the minimum.
Full Description: With the national percentage of renewable energy mandates being imposed across the country, Louisiana falls well short of the minimum percentage. Their initial goal is to build a 5MW solar farm in Central Louisiana.  Solar farming is non-existent in the state of Louisiana and they want to introduce this to the state as a supplement to the coal and natural gas fired generation stations that are currently supplying power to the state.  A majority of these stations are nearing the end of their life expectancy and reliability issues are increasing.  As the the state grows, the electricity demand will increase.  This will place even heavier loads on the existing stations. Their goal is to supplement and fill the gaps when existing stations fail or have lengthy outages with clean solar power.  In addition, education for the population of the state with the positive long term effects of clean renewable solar power.     Long  term goal for the company is a 5 farm build, (5-6MW each).  Strategically placed across the state to supplement their dependence on natural gas and coal fired power generation.   Eventually, bringing 25-30MW of clean renewable power to the state over the course of a 5-10 year build.  Design, construction, commissioning, and 1st year of operation will be overseen by a third party company that is the leader in the Utility Scale Solar Farming sector.

Full Description: Who We Are We are a peer-to-peer recruiting company that has made the job hunting process more efficient and effective by utilizing the power of social networking platforms to intelligently match our members to their next career opportunity.  When you apply you are assigned a Loud Mountain Career Consultant that will assist you in every step of the process. In addition, if you refer a colleague to an open position, and the colleague is hired, you receive a reward for your referral. Also, our services are 100% free of charge easy to use and completely confidential. All you have to do is follow the three simple steps below to get started. 1. Sign in: Connecting with us through LinkedIn only takes a minute. We then analyze your professional profile and make job recommendations based on many aspects of our career. Once again, all of your information is completely confidential and is shared with no one outside of the Loud Mountain community without your permission. 2. Apply: Once you find a job you like, you can apply with just a few clicks. From here, you will be assigned a Loud Mountain Career Consultant that will assist you throughout the hiring process. 3. Refer: In addition, we match your colleagues (1st level connections on LinkedIn) to open positions.  If you feel there is a correct  match, you can refer them to any of these opportunities, and with their permission, we will assist them in finding their next career challenge. Get Started Today! Loud Mountain Principle Values Trust- Every piece of information you give us is held in the highest of confidence. None of your information will be given to any potential employer and we will not contact any of your connections without your permission. Quality- Our goal is to place qualified candidates in the best positions available for them. When you work with Loud Mountain, you will receive the highest quality personal service until you are hired. Simplicity- We want our site to be clear and easy to use. Signing up, sharing jobs, and applying for open positions should only take a few clicks.   Disclaimer: The information you provide will be held in the strictest confidence. We will not contact your connections without you permission or in any way disclose your information or your network's information to anyone outside of the Loud Mountain Community.

Description: Locolo is a mobile app for sharing things.
Full Description: Locolo is a mobile app for sharing things. Rent everything that is not worth buying and make money by renting out your stuff. Locolo changes the way how people consume and own things. We encourage people to save money by not buying things that can be rented and make some extra cash on the things they already own but don’t often use. Locolo helps citizens to be more mobile and less attached to things. Our product is ‘eco-friendly’ and advocates sensible consumption of consumer goods. Locolo is a matchmaking platform connecting people that are in need of certain things on one hand and people that own those things but don’t use them on the other. It can work like C2C and B2C and vice versa. At the core of the program is its internal scoring system responsible for the safety of the deals and selection of the best renting options.

Description: LovePalz offers motion sensing technology that creates two-way physical interaction over the internet in real time.
Full Description: LovePalz is a brand new concept of motion sensing technology that aims to create physical feelings as real as possible in virtual sex experience.  It can simulate your actions and cause physical contact over internet in real time. Through our service, you and your lover each hold one device and as long as you remain connected to the internet, the device automatically senses your actions and conveys them to your partner's toy!  In short, how you use it is simultaneously reflected on your lover's toy, physically! bringing you and your lover together even when you are miles apart. The speed sensor in Zeus will detect the speed of male action and send to the Hera, the female toy. Hera will reflect and match Zeus's speed automatically. Hera on her part, will sense the pressure inside the toy based on the female's reaction and then send that information to Zeus. Zeus's air pump will configure its tightness automatically based on the received signal

Categories: Artificial Intelligence, Augmented Reality, Enterprise Software, Information Technology, Internet of Things, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Transportation, Warehousing
Description: LogistiVIEW combines AR and AI on industrial smart devices to improve the productivity and job satisfaction of logistics workers.
Full Description: LogistiVIEW's Connected Worker Platform combines augmented reality, computer vision, and artificial intelligence on industrial mobile computers and smart glasses to improve the productivity and job satisfaction of workers in logistics.  Labor is the second most expensive part of the greater than $1T logistics market (behind fuel) and billions of dollars are lost annually to labor shortages, inefficiency, errors, training, and turnover.  By enabling workers with intuitive AR instructions, key task information, and AI-driven workflow, workers are faster, smarter, safer, and more accurate.  When workers are connected to devices around them such as carts, shelves, conveyors, and autonomous robots, LogistiVIEW creates flexible automation that replaces expensive fixed-automation with AR-rendered, software-defined automation that is both faster and less expensive to install and change than traditional fixed automation. ​ Our mission is to make logistics more economically sustainable by improving workforce flexibility, productivity, and job satisfaction.

Description: Loom Network is a Platform as a Service built on top of Ethereum that allows developers to run large-scale decentralized applications.
Full Description: Loom Network is a PaaS (Platform as a Service) that allows Ethereum based Solidity applications to be run on main chain and on private, and semi public chains. The goal is to allow app developers to have smart contracts that can access more computing power when necessary, or the same computing at lower costs for tasks like free trials for onboarding new users or applications that doesn't need the full security of the blockchain. Included with this system they have the ability to interact with APIs from third parties that are not on chain such as connecting with Twillio to do 2factor authentication for smart contracts. Loom tries to be the one-stop full-service platform that allow smart contract developers and traditional developers alike to create their applications without switching programming languages or manually managing servers, and all with the added advantage of easily integrating their apps with outside world. Like a Blockchain-aware and Blockchain-ready AWS.

Description: Lovenergi is ant Italian innovative start-up that respects the list of ethical and social values ​​defined by the Watly brand.
Full Description: Lovenergi is ant Italian innovative start-up that respects the list of ethical and social values ​​defined by the Watly brand. The team that implements these values ​​follows the BEWatly philosophy , thus placing its research and development, commercial and marketing activities on the three fundamental pillars of modern civilization: The English acronym LOV stands for List of Values, or List of Values, ethics and sustainability, on which our corporate mission is based. They are oriented towards the development of technologies for the benefit of the human being and of all the inhabitants of the planet Earth, including animals and plants.  With the LOV approach associated with the concept of ENERGI we intend to establish a new industrial paradigm capable of transcending the evolutionary needs of modern society towards a state of harmony between technology, life, energy and resources. As an innovative start-up , we intend to give the whole world a further example of the excellence of "Made in Italy". The Italian I in the word ENERGI (instead of the Y) recalls the initial of Italy. Lovenergi is one of the elite working groups that has the production license of the thermodynamic computers of the Watly 3.0 family. These electro-thermodynamic systems operate with solar energy, are able to purify water from any type of contamination, generate off-grid electricity and provide advanced telecommunications services. Water, energy and telecommunications are the fundamental pillars of modern civilization. Watly series computers ensure access to all the communities on the planet that are still lacking. With Watly technology we are laying the groundwork for the advent of Energy_net : the network of thousands of Watly units connected to each other all over the world. This is the true energy smart-grid and the "Internet of Things" of the 21st century. Within the Energy_Net, information merges with water and clean energy, transmitting both data and objects and real power. In this perspective, the love for energy ( love energy ) also becomes a sensitization to energy and its conscious use.  The advent of Energy_net will free hundreds of millions of people from social and economic poverty, launching an era of abundance and sustainable growth for all of humanity.

Description: Looking4.com is an airport parking website.
Full Description: Looking4Parking.com is a website providing price comparison and bookings for On-Site, Off-Site, Park & Ride and Meet & Greet parking at all the UKâ€:tm:s major airports and seaports. The business was founded by Dave Greenbrown, Adam Casper & Martin Mansell in early 2010. The groupâ€:tm:s first office was based in Daveâ€:tm:s house in Kippax, Leeds, but the rapid expansion of the business meant that a move was necessary, seeing the ever-growing team move to offices in Barnsley before finally moving back to a new Leeds city centre office, which they currently share with notable design and events giants Logistik. Martin said the trio started the business because: â€œWe felt the online airport parking market was confusing, cluttered and difficult to shop in and so we saw the opportunity for a simple website and booking engine that was guaranteed to find the best deals and lowest prices"  The company vision is simple, yet effective - â€œTo be the first airport parking brand which springs to mind. To be innovators in terms of web and mobile technologyâ€ - and this vision has been the driving force behind the looking4parking.com ethos.  July 2011 will see the launch of a new, innovative website boasting a slick design, enhanced features and an improved customer experience. The month will also see Looking4Parking moving into the mobile app market as they prepare to launch their collaboration with iPhone App developers Pink Gorilla, offering information, bookings and discounts directly to the shoppersâ€:tm: hands.  Business Development Executive George Wall believes the key to Looking4Parkingâ€:tm:s success is due to the companies willingness to adapt to new technologies.  â€œThe world is changing, people donâ€:tm:t communicate via the traditional methods any more. New media such as Twitter, mobile apps, Facebook and viral marketing are a far more effective way to engage your audience, and I believe the reason weâ€:tm:re doing so well is because we acknowledge that.â€  Company director Martin Mansell also realises that the internet is a crucial part of the business.  â€œOur websites tick all the boxes in terms of usability and optimisation, giving our customers a first class experience from search to booking and beyond. Our knowledge of SEO has also been instrumental â€“ enabling us to maximise our online exposure while keeping our advertising budget under control.â€

Description: LoungeUp is a guest management platform
Full Description: LoungeUp – Guest Engagement Platform LoungeUp is a guest relationship and data management platform designed for hotels to increase their revenue and improve their guest satisfaction through the smart use of data. This platform allows hoteliers to personalise interactions with guests across all communication channels (emails / SMS / guest portal / chat / push notifications...). LoungeUp centralises guest data from PMS, social networks, online reputation and SMS / email / chat conversations, this provides hotel owners with enhanced guest profiles and an ultra-fast search engine, which allows them to customise marketing actions according to each guest. THE GUESTS FEEL ACCOMPANIED THROUGHOUT THEIR WHOLE JOURNEY: - Straight after the booking process, guests are directly in touch with the hotel  by way of familiar channels such as SMS or email, and they receive relevant information concerning their future stay.  - Guests have access to an extensive portable travel guide designed to enable them to make the most of their stay and to prepare their visit prior to arrival.  - Pain points are relieved: pre-filled digital police registration forms to speed up the arrival process, a digital room key, online forms to report problems or book services in just a few clicks, … - Guests have many ways in which they can contact the hotel: SMS, email, chat, messenger… THE HOTEL EASILY CATERS TO EACH GUEST’S NEEDS:  - It is easier for hotels to provide tailored services and recommendations when they have access to their guests’ preferences. Ultra-personalisation becomes effortless and drives more revenue (around €10 additional revenue per customer) - The reception can focus more on guest care when administrative works are simplified and automated (booking confirmation, stay preparation, check-in, welcome message, satisfaction survey...) - Loyalty actions are more relevant and effective as they are ultra-personalised to each guest.

Description: Loop helps companies use feedback to make smarter, faster decisions.
Full Description: Our mission is to help companies use customer feedback to make highly informed go-to-market decisions in near real time. We combine the power of text analytics and machine learning with a beautiful and simple user experience to provide companies with a more affordable and timely alternative to traditional market research. Loop automatically scans the places where conversations are taking place, like online review sites, and uses text analytics to bubble up key feedback trends and product gaps that need attention. Our solution enables our customers to act quickly on insights by creating product, pricing, and go-to-market strategies to address real time feedback and then track the impact of actions taken over time. By using feedback to inform strategy, companies can constantly improve decisions on who to serve, what to build, and how to grow.

Description: Localist is a software company that users can use to market their events through an online calendar.
Full Description: OUR VISION  Every event, discoverable. Why? Humans are social animals. When they come together, a connection is created, which creates a stronger bond of tolerance and understanding. Scale that up, and we're living in a more tolerant and understanding society. OUR MISSION  Lower the barriers that prevent events from getting online. OUR PRODUCTS  Our core product is calendar marketing software that helps organizations publish, manage and promote upcoming events to their audience. Our native mobile app, Tailgate, helps audience members connect, engage and react with each other at events in real-time. The result of using our software is far-reaching. Our products reinforce the idea that events and event content are powerful ways to connect communities to organizations. Ultimately, we want every public event happening in the world to be online so people can discover them and connect with each other. If "connection" is the atom of the idea, what's a great way to connect people together at a large scale? Events! Bringing people together around a common cause or interest sparks thousands of these connections in a single moment. Our products facilitate that. WHAT IT'S LIKE TO WORK HERE  We are not the typical "work hard, play hard" company culture, (which just translates to long hours and heavy drinking). Instead, we focus on making everyone feel deeply rewarded by working on things that matter while actively encouraging healthy work-life balance.

Description: Leading SaaS platform for Smart Buildings
Full Description: Locatee AG develops the first globally scalable Smart Building Platform. The big data software solution augments the physical workspace with real-time data to create smart and occupant-oriented office buildings. The highly scalable and patent pending technology enables the analysis of the actual use of office space throughout a company's portfolio, in buildings, floors or departments. It does not require any expensive hardware installations (e.g. sensors). Machine learning algorithms analyse and anonymise data from the existing IT infrastructure (Wi-Fi, LAN and other data sources) continuously and in real-time. The solution provides insights into space efficiency, mobility and collaboration behaviour of the entire organisation. Thanks to Locatee global organisation such as EY, Zurich Insurance, Biogen or Swiss Re get valuable insights to identify their savings potential, optimize their workspace and increase the workspace experience of every employee. Our platform is used across 6 continents by some of the largest organisations worldwide.

Local Social Network for Your Daily Life
Full Description: LocalCircles is the world's first comprehensive local social network for your daily life. Our mission is to transform daily lives by enabling people to easily find "credible" information around their day-to-day needs. Typically, when you need to find a good doctor, an after-school class, an auto-service center, or what local factors to consider before buying an apartment - you would ask a neighbor, a co-parent, a colleague, or a trusted local friend. Many a times, if your local contacts do not have the answer, you turn to the Internet, do hit and trial, or simply wait until you find a credible source of information. This often results in inconvenience, unwanted delay, and, sometimes, even added cost. LocalCircles addresses all these challenges by providing people and their local associates (neighbors, co-parents, colleagues, and friends) a technology driven high trust, secure environment to improve the efficiency of their daily lives. In addition, LocalCircles enables people to strengthen their association with the local communities they live, work, or associate with.

VISION	 Connect Everyone to Everything, Everywhere. Description: Locate Special Diet is an app that enables its users to find food and drink options nearby based on their dietary preferences.
Full Description: Locate Special Diet helps you find food and drink options nearby that match your dietary preferences. Find Paleo, Vegan and Vegetarian, Gluten-Free, Organic or Locally Grown Food and Drink options on the go. Filter by any combination of dietary preferences to meet the needs of yourself or a group of people. Are you Paleo but your friend is Vegetarian, and you want to find a restaurant that will meet both of your dietary needs? Our app is your solution.  Recommended by Nutritionists, Doctors, Pharmacists, Health Clinics, Personal Trainers, Gyms and other Health Care Practitioners.  *Currently covers a select group of cities (40 U.S. cities). We add new cities, local businesses or chains every week.* LOCATE SPECIAL DIET HIGHLIGHTS: ~ Dietary Preferences such as: Paleo, Vegan, Vegetarian, Gluten-Free, Organic or Locally Grown Foods ~ Find Restaurants and Grocery Stores nearby that match your Dietary Preference or Restriction ~ Filter by Diet Preference of Choice - Gluten-Free, Vegetarian, Vegan, Paleo or Organic/Local Foods. Filter by ANY combination of Those Diet Preferences ~ View Menus for Various Restaurants ~ View the Paleo Tip Sheet for ordering Paleo at Restaurants ~ View our NEW Dining Guide - Dining out Tip Sheets for Gluten-Free, Vegan and Paleo ~ Filter Restaurants by Cuisine (Italian, Tex-Mex) ~ Find Businesses with Drinks (Alcoholic or Non-Alcoholic) ~ Read Tips Submitted for Various Businesses by Our Team or Users ~ Submit Menu Photos ~ Save Businesses or Tips to Your Favorites List ~ View the Business Website Without Leaving the App ~ Get Directions to the Destination ~ Call the Business ~ Use our Map Feature ~ And MORE! ACTUAL USER REVIEWS: "I was recently diagnosed with Celiac Disease and my husband is Vegetarian. We use Locate Special Diet all of the time to help us find local restaurants that meet both of our dietary needs. It's a huge life saver." "I love this app! I don't have any special diet restrictions, but many of my friends do, and this app is so helpful for when trying to decide where we will eat. This app allows me to research restaurants that will not only cater to those with special diets, but also to those who just want to have a meal with friends - regardless of diet limitations." "This app is invaluable for anyone who follows a special diet. It makes grocery shopping AND eating out a breeze. Well organized and the filters are awesome. Sigh. Living and traveling gluten-free just got a whole lot easier for me and I'm stoked." Download Locate Special Diet and find your next favorite spot that caters to your diet preference or restriction.  City request? Feedback? Email us at: info@LocateSpecialDiet.com

Description: Logmore combines the world's first QR data logger and a cloud service to offer the fastest and easiest circumstance monitoring.
Full Description: Logmore offers small, extremely cost-efficient data loggers for your circumstance monitoring needs, supported with our own cloud service Logmore Web for data collection and mobile application - a complete service package to ensure that you have all the vital information accessible to you. Data upload happens in a second through a simple scan of the QR code, compatible with any smart device that has a camera. Starting at a mere 1€/month per device.  Our services suit every need, be it cold chain, logistics, construction projects or consumer use. Ranging from simple temperature sensors to tilt, impact and humidity sensors, we can offer the solutions to suit your exact wishes. Our mission has been to reduce the spoilage and waste of food, pharmaceutical goods and other fragile or sensitive products by boosting business intelligence with our distinct data logging service ever since the founding of Logmore in early 2017. When you recognize issues, you can fix them. After thorough development in cooperation with our customers and partners, the Logmore service package was officially launched at Slush 2018 with our first model, Logmore Two, designed for temperature monitoring for food, pharma and chemicals. Even more versatile, the new Logmore Three contains sensors for humidity, shocks and tilts as well. The simplified Logmore model One provides the optimal monitoring option for short use periods and one-way shipments, being the shipment monitoring solution recommended by the Association of Finnish Pharmacies. We want to make data logging so easy and cost-efficient that any company in need of cold chain or other logistics monitoring can afford and not waste a minute more on it than absolutely necessary. After all, the time and resources spent on inefficient operations has a negative effect on so many things. Smarter data logging for everyone, for the benefit of the people, the industry, and the environment.

Description: LogSentinel is a blockchain-inspired secure audit trail. It helps companies to ensure that their data is tamper-free and securely logged.
Full Description: Data is now a company’s most valuable asset. Industry analysts estimate that 40% of all security incidents involve insiders manipulating confidential business data to gain at the expense of your company finance, reputation, and credibility. LogSentinel is a solution that makes it impossible to manipulate data without detection, and with a partial verification of our blockchain every half an hour, detection is almost real time. You will need such a solution if you ask yourself some of these questions: Do you need to make sure that no one has manipulated the data you have? Do you need to track access to your information and store the logs securely?  Do you want to use cutting-edge cryptography to securely log your business events?  Will you ever need to proof the integrity of your data to your business partners, customers, or in court? Do you need to demonstrate compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) or any other industry-specific regulation?

Description: Loop Industries is a leading sustainable plastics technology innovator.
Full Description: Loop Industries, Inc. is a technology and licensing company whose mission is to accelerate the world’s shift toward sustainable plastic and away from our dependence on fossil fuels. Loop owns patented and proprietary technology that depolymerizes no and low value waste PET plastic and polyester fiber, including plastic bottles and packaging, carpet and polyester textile of any colour, transparency or condition and even ocean plastics that have been degraded by the sun and salt, to its base building blocks (monomers). The monomers are filtered, purified and repolymerized to create virgin-quality Loop™ branded PET plastic resin and polyester fiber suitable for use in food-grade packaging to be sold to consumer goods companies to help them meet their sustainability objectives. Through our customers and production partners, Loop is leading a global movement toward a circular economy by raising awareness of the importance of preventing and recovering waste plastic from the environment to ensure plastic stays in the economy for a more sustainable future for all.

Description: Local Funeral offers services and packages for pre-planned and unplanned funerals.
Full Description: Localfuneral.com connects you with thousands of customer rated funeral providers. "Pre Plan" for a funeral or if you have an immediate need for funeral services shop for funeral packages.  If you are pre planning for a funeral for yourself or someone else, in less than a minute, submit for free quote requests for funeral services to multiple funeral homes.  Control how quickly you want to receive offers by selecting the time frame you want to leave your request for quotes open. Death care providers ranging from crematories to funeral homes, then place competing bids to win your business. This means that you get bids in a fraction of the time you spend getting quotes by phone or by visiting thousands of websites.  Most of all, save money because funeral directors are competing against each other.    The average cost of a funeral in the USA is $7,500, and the prices continue to rise every year. Localfuneral understands that you are shopping around for the fourth largest purchases you will ever make in your life (after your home, education and a car). That is why we invite you to discover what other customers in your area paid for the same funeral package via the Local Funeral true market value section of our wizard.  We don't want customers to over pay for funeral services.  Compare funeral homes' reviews powered by Yelp, funeral packages, and prices side by side. Receive competing bids, communicate anonymously via our message system with the funeral director, and select the winning bid.   Then, we will put you in contact with the funeral director you select to coordinate payment options. Other funeral homes who participated will not receive your contact information to avoid unwanted calls.    Once the transaction is completed, you immediately have the option to start a memorial fundraiser page to help the family and friends cope with the emotional and financial costs of their loss.  The money you raise will go directly to the funeral home providing the funeral package you selected, and you can not raise more than what the services and products actually costs.  Easily share the memorial fundraiser page with your friends and family via email or social networks. The fundraiser page allow you to share an obituary, date/time of the funeral service and burial, directions to the services, and it has a timeline to share memories, pictures and videos. Your friends and family can send you sympathy gifts, send their condolences, and they can also easily share images and videos. All the memories of your loved one shared in one place.  If you have an immediate need for funeral services, we offer a service where you can instantly search pre built funeral packages, compare them side by side, read reviews, book them online, and start a memorial fundraiser page.  The service is free for people to use. Funeral homes can list their services for free, but we get paid by the funeral home for any sale generated from our website.

Categories: 3D Technology, Augmented Reality, E-Commerce, Home Decor, Mobile Apps, Real Estate, Retail, Retail Technology
Description: The Ultimate 3D Customer Experience Engine. Inspired by Reality. For Furniture Retail, Manufacturers and Real Estate.
Full Description: LOFT Inc., is an innovator in the 3D visualization of home furnishings in rooms. Its core technology enables photographs of a room to quickly be turned into a 3D environment that can be redecorated and is used by leading branded furniture retailers. Its award-winning, cloud-based platform roOomy, enables virtual staging and redecoration in 3D of real estate listings, connecting home furnishings retailers and the real estate community with consumers at the moment they are considering a home purchase. Business Summary:  LOFT is the global market leader of cloud-based, patent-pending, 2D to 3D virtual, real time technology that enables consumers to visualize furniture purchases which in turn enables retailers, furniture manufacturers and real estate agents to increase sales, shorten sales cycles and reduce returns.  How It Works:  LOFT enables consumers to take a 2D photo of a room and transform the space to a 3D interactive environment. Its features will spark consumers’ imaginations as they virtually remove current furniture, move pieces around, customize textiles and flooring, choose new furniture and make confident decisions about new purchases. This will ultimately benefit consumers, retailers, furniture manufacturers and real estate agents. Customer Opportunity:  The LOFT 3D technology allows retailers, furniture manufacturers and real estate agents to  1.) Incrementally increase average order values;  2.) Shorten sales cycles;  3.) Reduce returns,  4.) Develop a deeper relationship with the customer as their room becomes your showroom. Product/Services:   LOFT enables retailers to offer customers the opportunity to view rooms be it in-store, online or on a mobile device. LOFT creates a collaboration among customers, furniture retailers and new real estate agents. Target Markets:  LOFT focuses on highly competitive B2B industries that are beginning to integrate digital strategies into sales and marketing. Customers:  Crate and Barrel, Havertys, Donghia, Rubelli, Carpet Court and Trendhopper among others. Sales/Marketing Strategy:  LOFT utilizes aggregate data and analytics derived from its beta customers to provide potential customers real financial data. LOFT is in conversations with the top 50 retailers/brands in the world. Business Model:  LOFT’s business model is based on both a revenue share and a subscription model. Competitors and Competitive Advantage:  AutoDesk’s Homestyler and Floored are LOFT’s closest competitors. LOFT is the only company that can truly transform a 2D photo into a 3D model with true photo-realism that allows consumers to remove items in the room and then augment with new items.

Description: Digital Healthcare and e-commerce company involved in the sleep wellness space
Full Description: Living with sleep-disordered breathing is challenging. Treating it shouldn’t be.  That’s why we created Lofta.  Driven by a desire to streamline a needlessly complex experience, we set out to un-complicate the process. Their expert advice is fee free and Their service is simple and straightforward - saving you time and money.

Description: LogN is a web and app development firm that emphasizes design and efficiency.
Full Description: LogN is a design and engineering company. It provides web applications, mobile applications, cloud facilities, interactions design, user testing, and virtual design.  LogN is based in San Francisco, California.

Categories: Creative Agency, Graphic Design, Online Portals
Description: LOGO123 makes logo design affordable with logo contests. A team of designers compete and create professional logo for your small business.
Full Description: Logo123.com is a logo design website which offers express custom logo design at a fair price of $5 per concept in a time consuming logo design process. Our designers are standing 24/7 and are ready to deliver the highest quality logo designs.

Description: One Stop Shop for Lottery Players
Full Description: LotteryPros.com provides lottery reviews, news, results, and allow customers the opportunity to play over 40 different international lotteries online. Lottery Pros website is available in 32 different languages, making it easily accessible to people from all over the world.  Lottery Pros include information to help you make better decisions on why and how you play the lottery. It provides everything from the Professional worldwide lottery reviews to lottery systems and lottery strategies. LotteryPros.com features a nifty little lucky number generator, hot & cold numbers and jackpot graph widgets to help you make better decisions about your lottery games.

Description: L&T Co. is on a mission to take the world's knowledge and write it down.
London & Partners is the promotional company for London, United Kingdom.
Full Description: London & Partners is the Mayor of London's official promotional agency. Their mission is to tell London’s story brilliantly to an international audience. Their purpose is to support the Mayor’s priorities by promoting London internationally, as the best city in the world in which to invest, work, study and visit. They do this by devising creative ways to promote London and to amplify the Mayor’s messages, priorities and campaigns to international audiences.  They are a not-for-profit public-private partnership, funded by the Mayor of London and their network of commercial partners.

Description: Loeb & Loeb LLP focuses on select core industries and practice areas rather than endeavoring to be all things to all clients.

Categories: Artificial Intelligence, Cloud Management, Computer, Document Management, Information Technology, Management Information Systems, Software
Description: A Canadian computer software company and the developers behind Paradigm — an innovative and cutting-edge dental management software.
Full Description: Logic Tech is a Canadian company that has been proudly servicing the dental industry for over 30 years. Our Paradigm Clinical software has been installed in over 1,000 offices across Canada.  At Logic Tech, we are dedicated to merging new technologies with Paradigm Clinical to provide the very best practice management solution on the market. As the speed of technology continues to change the landscape of our society, we pride ourselves in staying abreast of the new development of these technologies. Our objective is to utilize cutting-edge technology in providing dentists with the tools to both manage and market their business efficiently and successfully.

Description: Lolaflora is an international flower and gifting delivery company operates in Spain, Mexico, France, Italy and Australia.
Full Description: Lolaflora is an international flower and gifting delivery company operates in Spain, Mexico, France, Italy and Australia. Backed by Amazon.com and European venture capital company Hummingbird Ventures, Lolaflora offers its customers exceptional quality goods and services.

Description: Sell your used electronics instantly and have them picked up within minutes.
Full Description: LootScoot is the easiest way to sell your used electronics for the best possible price. LootScoot provides an app-based service where users can sell their used electronics instantly and have them picked up within minutes. LootScoot partners with local entrepreneurs who "bid" on the price shown to users in instant auctions so that users always get the best possible prices. LootScoot is currently available in San Francisco and is the easiest way for customers to sell their used iPhones.

Categories: Information Technology, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Transportation
Description: LOG-NET technology enables partners in trade to transact business on a global basis in real time on the internet.
Full Description: LOG-NET, Inc. of Red Bank, N.J. was established to provide the finest trade, transportation and logistics information systems. The company has grown from a supplier of custom logistics solutions into a developer of integrated on-demand, end-to-end (E2E) supply chain solutions active in more than seventy countries around the world. LOG-NET's management and design team is comprised of individuals with outstanding technical skills and practical operating experience in international, multi-modal logistics and operations management. This in-depth understanding of trade and logistics balanced with the highest levels of technical capability is reflected throughout the company's products and services. LOG-NET, Inc. continues its cutting-edge development with a new solution that permits mass customization, rendering in multiple languages, fully integrated EDI interfaces, wireless access and the most innovative web user interface in the world.

Categories: Media and Entertainment, Online Portals, Video Streaming
Description: Looke offers online movie streaming services that allows the user to watch movies and TV series online without leaving home.
Full Description: Looke offers online movie streaming services that allows the user to watch movies and TV series online without leaving home. Looke is an innovative streaming platform where the user has complete freedom to choose where, when and how he wants to watch the chosen content.

Description: LocalStay is a travel guide on tour locations, bars, restaurants, night clubs and shopping spots in major cities across the world.
Full Description: LocalStay is the ultimate travel guide listing the top places you must visit in all major cities around the world. LocalStay curates lists of the top 10 bars you should grab a drink, the top 10 restaurants you should eat, the top 10 activities you should do, the top 10 sights you must see, the top 10 festivals you should attend and the top 10 night clubs you should go dance - and the top 10 fun facts you should know about the city you are visiting. Currently there are curated lists available of Amsterdam, Berlin, Stockholm and London. More cities are coming soon.

Description: LoanPaymentPro is a merchant services and technology firm servicing the debt repayment industry.
Full Description: LoanPaymentPro is a revolutionary merchant service and technology firm servicing the debt repayment industry. They were developed by experienced lenders for lenders utilizing proprietary patent pending technology to develop the only compliant and cost effective Bankcard, ACH, and RCC/Check21 acceptance platform for brick and mortar, P2P, marketplace platforms and online lenders.
